mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_ID , R.REPLY_CONTENT , R.REPLY_WRITE_DATE , R.REPLY_UPDATE_DATE , R.REPLY_STATUS , R.REPLY_WRITER , R.BOARD_ID , U.USER_NICKNAME , U.USER_PROFILE_IMG FROM BOARD_REPLY R LEFT JOIN INI_USER U ON R.REPLY_WRITER = U.USER_ID WHERE R.BOARD_ID = #{board_id} ORDER BY REPLY_ID ASC , REPLY_WRITE_DATE ASC
mapper.delete: delete from board_reply where reply_id = #{reply_id} and reply_status = #{reply_status}
mapper.select: select * from board_reply where reply_id = #{reply_id} order by reply_write_date asc
